user_list.disclaimer: Downvotes and private votes are not shown.

errors.cannot_reach_server: Cannot reach server, please check your connection
errors.failed_to_load_data: Failed to load data from server, please try again later
errors.tag_limit: Maximum tag limit reached. Upgrade your account to search for more tags at once.
errors.database_timeout: Your search took too long to execute and was cancelled.
errors.rate_limited: You're being rate limited. Please try again later
errors.pagination_limit: You're have reached pagination limit. It means you cannot scroll more
errors.max_capacity: Server is under heavy load and cannot handle the request be, please try again later
errors.down: Server is down. please try again later
errors.unknown: Unknown server error, please report this issue to the developer

search.no_result: We searched far and wide, but no results were found.
search.metatags_notice: Free metatags won't count against the tag search limits

search.auto_focus_search_bar: Auto focus search bar when first open search view

scroll_behavior.persistent_description: Keep the search bar visible while scrolling.

search.hide_bookmarked_posts_from_search_result: Hide bookmarked posts from search results

settings.infinite_scroll_warning: Might crash the app if you scroll for a long time

image_quality.high_quality_notice: High quality image will take longer to load.

image_viewer.slideshow_video_behavior_explanation: Determines how the slideshow handles videos during transitions.

slideshow_video_behaviors.wait_for_completion_description: Wait for videos to finish before advancing to next slide
slideshow_video_behaviors.fixed_interval_description: Advance after fixed interval, even if video is still playing

image_viewer.slideshow_interval_explanation: Value less than 1 second will automatically skip transition
image_viewer.swipe_mode_disclaimer: Some custom gestures may not work in all modes

swipe_modes.horizontal_description: Gallery-style left/right swiping. Like photo galleries and media apps.
swipe_modes.vertical_description: TikTok-style up/down swiping. Popular on short video platforms. Portrait mode only.

image_viewer.enable_video_cache_description: Download videos while streaming and cache them to reduce data usage and faster playback on subsequent views.

engine.auto_description: Automatically select the best engine based on your device capabilities.
engine.default_description: Works well with most devices, may have issues with some video formats or older devices.
engine.mdk_description: Fast loading, better performance for certain video formats, but unstable and may cause crashes.
engine.mpv_description: Good format support and performance, slower loading time
engine.webview_description: Good compatibility but higher resource usage and bad performance, use it as a last resort.

theme.dynamic_color_desktop_description: Sync theme color with OS's accent color
theme.dynamic_color_unsupported_description: This device does not support dynamic color.

viewer.harmonize_colors_description: Adjusts tag colors to match the accent color

privacy.enable_biometric_lock_notice: Only works on devices with biometrics support and has been set up.

download.skip_existing_files_explanation: This will prevent downloading files that already exist in the folder. This is useful when you don't want to download the same file multiple times.
download.title: Download

data_and_storage.clear_cache_on_start_up: Clear image cache on start up
data_and_storage.video_cache_limit_description: Maximum size for video cache storage

backup_and_restore.auto_backup_tooltip: Backups are created when you open the app. No backups occur when the app is closed.
backup_and_restore.export_no_items: Export failed: No items could be exported
backup_and_restore.import_no_items: Import failed: No items could be imported
backup_and_restore.invalid_location_error: Cannot export to this location, try using "Download" or "Documents" folder. Create one if it does not exist.

receive_data.title: Receive data
receive_data.no_devices_found(rich):
No devices found. Start transfer on the other device first.

Tap ${tapHere(_)} to add manually by IP address.

errors.port_required: IP address must contain a port

send_data.name: Name
send_data.disclaimer: Transfer might not work on public WiFi networks (coffee shops, libraries) due to security restrictions. Please use a private network like your home WiFi.
send_data.no_networks_error: WiFi connection required to transfer data. Please connect to a WiFi network and try again.

backward_import.title: Importing from an older version detected
backward_import.reconfirm_question: Backward import might not work as expected, are you sure?

version_mismatch.title: Importing from a different version detected
version_mismatch.confirmation_question:
The app version of the device you are trying to import is different from the current version of the app. This may cause compatibility issues and potential data loss. 

Are you sure you want to continue?

accessibility.reverseBooruConfigSelectorScrollDirectio: Reverse scroll direction of booru profiles
accessibility.swipeAreaToOpenSidebarDescription: The amount of area on the left side of the screen that can be used to trigger a swipe. Large values will block all horizontal gestures like the pagination swipe gesture.
accessibility.reduce_animations_description: Some features may not work as expected when this is enabled.
accessibility.volume_navigation_description: Navigate between posts using the volume keys when in image viewer.

settings.contact_developer_description: If you have any issues or suggestions, feel free to send me an email through this option
settings.feature_request_and_bug_report_descripti: Suggest features or report bugs through the GitHub repository

blacklisted_tags.limitation_notice: Only support NOT operator, OR operator, score metatag and rating metatag Blacklisting using other metatags won't work for current version.

download.nothing_to_show: Nothing to show, download updates are empty
download.invalid_folder_name_error: A folder cannot contain any of the following characters:
download.folder_select_warning:
The app can only download files inside public directories ({0}) for Android 11+.

Valid location examples:
[Internal] /storage/emulated/0/Download
[SD card] /storage/A1B2-C3D4/Download

Please choose another directory or create a new one if it doesn't exist.
This device's version is {1}.
download.storage_permission_explanation: Storage permission is needed to store download files.

saved_search.empty_saved_search: You haven't add any search yet
saved_search.saved_search_labels_description: *A list of tags to help categorize this search. Space delimited.

favorite_groups.initial_posts_hint: Enter ID numbers, separated by spaces (Optional)
favorite_groups.max_limit_warning: Member can only create 10 favorite groups
favorite_groups.duplicate_items_warning_notification: The entered posts already exist in the group
favorite_groups.detete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this favorite group?
favorite_groups.drag_hint: Long press and drag to reorder

favorite_tags.import_hint: Enter your tag string here. Space delimited.

rating.rationale: If you like the app, please take a little bit of your time to review it. It wouldn't take more than a few seconds and it really helps this project.

api_key_instructions.variants_1: *Log in to your account on the browser, visit My Account > Options > API Access Credentials to get your API key. If you see empty API key like &api_key=&user_id=, tick Generate New Key? and click the Save button at the very bottom to generate a new API key. Otherwise, copy the key and paste it into the field above. You can also copy the whole string from the API Access Credentials section and tap the button below.
api_key_instructions.variants_2: *Log in to your account on the browser, visit My Account > Options > API Access Credentials. Check if it is there. If not, the site does not support credentials, and you can ignore this.
api_key_instructions.variants_3: *Log in to your account on the browser, visit My Account > API Key. Copy your key or create a new one if needed, ensuring all permissions are enabled for proper app functionality.
api_key_instructions.variants_4: *Log in to your account on the browser, visit Account > Login tokens. Copy your Web Login Token or create a new one if needed and paste it here. If you use the Web Login Token, logout from the browser will make the token invalid.
api_key_instructions.variants_5: *Log in to your account on the browser, visit My Account > Options > API Access Credentials to get your API key. Copy the key and paste it into the field above. You can also copy the whole string from the API Access Credentials section and tap the button below.

shimmie2.danbooru_api_extension_notice: The app requires the Danbooru Client API extension to be installed on the site to function.
shimmie2.user_api_key_notice: The app requires the User API Key extension to be installed on the site on the site for login and private content access.

deletion.title: Delete '${profileName}'
deletion.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This action cannot be undone.

booru.invalid_booru_warning: It seems like the site is not running on the selected engine. Please try with another one.
booru.invalid_selected_profile_selection_reque: Select a profile from the list below to continue
booru.unknown_engine_selection_request: Select a booru engine to continue
booru.new_profile_leave_as_empty_tips: Not sure? Leave it as it is, you can change it later.
booru.unsaved_changes_reconfirm_question: Do you want to save your changes? Your changes will be lost if you don't save them.

choose_a_custom_filtering.one: Choose a rating that you want to exclude from the search.
choose_a_custom_filtering.other: Choose ratings that you want to exclude from the search.

booru.hide_deleted_description: Hide low-quality images, some decent ones might also be hidden.
booru.hide_banned_description: Completely hide images that have been banned by the site.
booru.validation_invalid_http_url: "{0}" is not an HTTP or HTTPS URL

auth_error.empty_key_warning: This site may require you to enter your API key or password to access its content.
auth_error.invalid_key_warning: Check your API key or credentials, as they may be invalid or expired.

gelbooru.basic_auth_description: Providing this information gives the app read access to your account. This is required by Gelbooru as of 06/2025.
gelbooru.advanced_auth_description: Providing this information allows you to edit your favorites and provides write access to your account. Note that if you change your password, you will need to log in again.
gelbooru.fav_button_tooltip_description: There is no way to check if an image has already been favorited. Although you can see the visual indicator after favoriting an image, it will reset when you restart the app. Don't worry, your favorites are still saved on the website.

listing.title: Listing
listing.thumbnail_button_description: Change the default button at the right bottom of the thumbnail.
listing.enable_profile_specific_settings_descrip: Override the global settings for this the profile. If enabled, global settings will be ignored until this is disabled.
listing.overridden_notice: These settings are overridden by custom listing. Go to Profile's Listing page instead.

search.title: Search
search.include_in_search: Include these tags in every search
search.exclude_from_search: Exclude these tags from every search
search.include_exclude_tooltip: These tags will be appended to every search that the app makes, not just the ones you make manually.
search.empty_blacklist_with_replace_notice: Empty blacklist with replace mode will effectively disable blacklist entirely.

blacklist_combine_mode.title: Combination mode
blacklist_combine_mode.merge_description: Merge this blacklist together with the other blacklists.
blacklist_combine_mode.replace_description: Override global blacklist with this blacklist. Useful when you want to have a blacklist that is only used for this profile without affecting the global blacklist.

test.failure: Failed to connect to proxy, please check your settings and try again

viewer.auto_fetch_notes_description: Automatically fetch and display notes whenever possible.
viewer.overridden_notice: These settings are overridden by custom viewer. Go to Profile's Viewer page instead.

gestures.title: Gestures
gestures.override_notice: Override the default gestures for this profile, select "None" to keep the original behavior.

downloads.title: Download
downloads.leave_empty_to_use_global: Leave empty to use the download location in settings.
downloads.bulk_slow_token_warning: Using slow tokens in bulk download will take a VERY long time to warm up before starting the actual download, consider not using them if possible.

filename.slow_token_warning: This token will slow down your downloads as it requires additional data fetching for each file.

appearance.title: Appearance

image_viewer_layout.title: Image viewer layout
image_viewer_layout.storage_tooltip: All changes are saved to your current profile.

preview.title: Layout Preview
preview.description: Preview your custom layout for $previewMinutes minutes. After that, you can either upgrade to $brand to keep using it or retry as many times as you want.
preview.currently_in_preview: You are currently previewing a custom layout.
preview.preview_expired: Your layout preview has ended. Upgrade to continue using premium layouts or start a new preview.

appearance.home_screen_description: Change the default home screen when opening this profile.
appearance.turn_on_description: Override the global theme using this profile's theme
appearance.overridden_notice: These settings are overridden by custom theme. Go to Profile's Appearance page instead.

auth_changed.has_mismatch_warning: The download site does not match the current site profile. Please change your profile to match the download site.
auth_changed.no_mismatch_warning:
This download session was initiated using a profile from the same site but with different credentials. This may lead to issues. 

Do you want to continue?

options.excluded_tags_description: Select additional tags to exclude from this batch
options.default_excluded_tags_from_source_list: Default blacklisted tags from the following sources:

errors.non_premium_template_limit: Only one template is allowed. Upgrade to $brand to create more templates.
errors.non_premium_session_limit: Only one active download session is allowed. Upgrade to $brand for additional sessions.
errors.non_premium_resume: Resuming saved download sessions is only available on $brand.
errors.non_premium_suspend: Saving download sessions is only available on $brand.

auth.login_required: You need to provide login details to use this feature.

premium.restore_failed: There was a problem restoring your subscription. Please try again later.
premium.legal_disclaimer: By subscribing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Subscription automatically renews until canceled. You can cancel anytime up to 24 hours before your current period ends.

benefits.exclusive_themes_description: Pick from a variety of themes to personalize each profile’s look
benefits.layout_customization_description: Customize how much info you see, and set your preferred home screen (Bookmarks, Search, etc.)
benefits.enhanced_bulk_download_description: Unlimited templates, multiple sessions and seamless resume after restart.
benefits.support_development_description: Help a solo developer keep the project going with regular updates and improvements.

thanks.title: Thank you!
thanks.description: You now can access premium features. Enjoy!

changelog.thanks_for_supporting: Thank you for supporting the development of this app by subscribing to $brand!
changelog.support_reminder: If you're enjoying these updates, consider supporting my work to keep the improvements coming.

search.name: Name

search.url_hint: URL or a part of it

video_player.change_video_player_engine_suggest: If this happens on a regular basis, consider using a different video player engine in the settings.
video_player.change_video_player_engine_request: Please change to a different video player engine in the settings.
